alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 20 at 8:59PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wisconsin... Mississippi River Near Alma Dam 4 affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. .Recent snowmelt and rainfall has brought an increase in water levels regionwide. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River Near Alma Dam 4. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued early Friday morning.
